title: AE/PR插件-人工智能运动动态模糊增强视觉特效 AI Motion Blur v1.1.26 Win/Mac
author: 大众脸
content: 借助使用插件 AI Motion Blur，您可以轻松为素材添加动态模糊效果，使其重现活力。无论您使用的是高速快门，还是处理过于锐利的数字素材，此工具都能添加适度的自然动态，打造精致的电影级画质。With AI Motion Blur, you can effortlessly breathe life back into your footage by adding motion blur. Whether you're working with high shutter speeds or digital footage that feels too sharp, this tool adds just the right amount of natural motion for a polished, filmic look.

other.update_info: v1.1.26更新内容：启用对 NVIDIA 5xxx 系列的支持。修复与其他一些第三方插件的加载冲突。
